title: Stones River National Battlefield: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer             Volunteer       APPLY NOW! (Search for National Park Service opportunities in Murfreesboro, Tennessee or type "Stones River" into the keyword search)  Â       Stones River National Battlefield offers a variety of volunteer opportunities including visitor services, living history, natural resource management and maintenance. We also offer volunteer internships for college students. For more information regarding Stones River National Battlefield volunteer program, please contact the Park Volunteer Coordinator.
